name: inquiringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you want to know something: look inquiringly She looked at her mother inquiringly. He turned inquiringly to the others. See
inquiring
More examplesFewer examplesShe fixed her brown eyes inquiringly upon him."Theo?" she said inquiringly.He glanced inquiringly at Luke as he spoke.
